Description: Woman's silk scarf printed with a central map surrounded by political portraits, captioned in Arabic.
Curator's comments: Produced to commemorate the creation of a Pan Arab Union.
Bibliographic references: Akbarnia et al 2018 / The Islamic World: a History in Objects (p.252, fig.2)
Exhibition history: EXHIBITED: 2011-2012, 6 Oct-19 Feb, London, The British Museum, 'Grayson Perry: The Tomb of the Unknown Craftsman'
Acquisition notes: Collected by Mark Littlewood during his period of residence in South Yemen in the 1960s.
